title: Literary Argument - suffering and tragic figure

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the suffering brought upon others by that figure contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the suffering brought upon others by that figure contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
